# Anyspell, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[Spell (Domain)|Spell 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 11]]

**Casting Time:** 15 minutes

**Components:** V, S, DF (and possibly M, F, and XP)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 15

*Although there is no visible effect from this spellcasting, you channel divine power through your mind, shaping and transforming this energy into the potential to cast one arcane spell.*

This spell functions like *[[Anyspell (Spell)|anyspell]]**,* except you can read and prepare any arcane spell of up to 5th level, and the prepared spell occupies your 6th-level domain spell slot.
